scam.translation[0].definitions[0].defin: a clever but dishonest way to get money
scam.translation[0].definitions[0].examp: He got involved in a credit card scam.
scam.translation[1].definitions[0].defin: to deceive someone in order to get money from them
scam.translation[2].definitions[0].defin: a clever but dishonest plan, usually to get money
scam.translation[2].definitions[0].examp: He was jailed for his part in an oil-trading scam.
